ygData.subject: R: [EQ_Necromancer] Which race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... far ... Everyone can go to freeport I guess but watch out for the paladins
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>I started a Human Necro a while back, in Qeynos. She's been slain by a
>merchant once, in her existance and that was just me being sloppy. (always
>always /con if you're a necromancer :) never know when some merchant is
>going to develop morals on you.) So necro's are not necessarily KOS, they
>just have to be a little more wary. The funny thing is, I made the journey
>to Freeport at level 8, and the guards there look upon her more favorably
>than the Qeynos guards, I suppose her evil reputation hasn't spread that
far
>just yet.
>


Everyone can go to freeport I guess
but watch out for the paladins
